犉字的基本解释

犉
chún
黄毛黑唇的黄牛。
七尺牛。

犉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rún］
［《廣韻》如匀切，平諄，日。］
身长七尺的牛。泛指大牛。

犉字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　犉； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页702第14
【廣韻】如勻切【集韻】濡純切【韻會】儒純切，?音眴。【爾雅·釋畜】黑脣犉。【詩·小雅】九十其犉。【傳】黃牛黑脣曰犉。又【周頌】殺時犉牡。　又【爾雅·釋畜】牛七尺爲犉。【疏】犉有二義，黑脣者爲犉，七尺者亦爲犉。尸子說六畜云：大牛爲犉，七尺。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?而宣切，音?。義同。本作?。◎按韻書無肰音，字彙音肰，非。《正字通》義取醇色，亦鑿。

犉字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
犉字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
ox
chún
Yellow-haired black-lip scalper.
Seven feet cow.
ox
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rún］
["Guangyun" is evenly cut, flat, day. ]
A seven-foot-long cow. Refers to Daniel in general.
ox
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part Two] [Bull Character Department] 　犉; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 702-14
[Guang Yun] Ruyun cut [Ji Yun] Wu Chun cut [Yun Hui] Confucian pure cut,? Yin 眴. 【Erya·Shihu】Black lips. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Ninety of its kind. [Biography] The scalper said F with black lips. And [Zhou Song] Kill Shi Mum.　[Erya·Shi Hu] Niu Qi Chi is F. 【Sparse】F has two meanings, the black lips are F, and the seven feet are also F. The corpse said Liu Huyun: Da Niu is F, seven feet.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? And Xuanqi, sound?. The same meaning. This work?. ◎According to the rhyme book, there is no sound, and the vocabulary is sound and non. The meaning of "Zhengzitong" is mellow and also chiseled.
